verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%>I <S%G4921>commend<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5402>Phebe<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%>, which <S%G5607>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchrea<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> ye <S%G4327>receive<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, as <S%G516>becometh<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that ye <S%G3936>assist<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739%G302>whatsoever<s%> <S%G4229>business<s%> she hath <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3778%G846>she<s%> hath <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>succourer<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G846%G1700>myself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G5294>have<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> laid <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks<s%>: unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.

<S%G2532>Likewise<s%> greet the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>. <S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>wellbeloved<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G2267>Herodion<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4773>kinsman<s%>. <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that be <S%G1537>of<s%> the household of <S%G3488>Narcissus<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G4648>mark<s%> them which <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G1370>divisions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4625>offences<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G3129>learned<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1578>avoid<s%> <S%G575%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> they that are <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> good <S%G5542>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fair <S%G2129>speeches<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G172>simple<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> is come <S%G864>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men. I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1909>behalf<s%>: but <S%G1161>yet<s%> I would <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> that which <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3303%G18>good<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G185>simple<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G4937>bruise<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G1722%G5034>shortly<s%>. The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G1050>Gaius<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G3581>host<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>, <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G2037>Erastus<s%> the <S%G3623>chamberlain<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2890>Quartus<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that is of <S%G1410>power<s%> to <S%G4741>stablish<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery<s%>, which was kept <S%G4601>secret<s%> since the world <S%G5550%G166>began<s%>,

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, made <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>:

To <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%>, be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. Â¶ Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
